subject: FROM FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK
body:
Attention Lewis,

This is to let you know that the Federal Reserve Bank of New York have
received your email with the content well noted and understood regarding
the transfer of your approved funds $10,500.000.00 and I am here to ensure
that you receive your funds as soon as possible.

Having gone through your email to me, you have requested for some details
proof of this transaction and I must let you know that you will definitely
all that you have requested in due time.

Kindly be informed that the requested documents will be mailed to you and
you will receive them at your door step. Note that we don't send important
documents in email to avoid stealing them in the internet.

All you need to do is to provide us with your correct house address to
enable us mail the documents to you. Also your contact phone number because
I have tried calling your several times and could not reach you.

Note that the required Processing/Stamp Duty fee is $980 only and the cost
of transfer fee is $2,700, making everything a total of $3,680 which you
will pay before the transfer of your funds $10,500.000.

However, I will advice you to proceed as urgent as possible and make the
payment to our receiving agent bank account given to you in my previous
email and get back to me with the transfer payment receipt to enable us
proceed and transfer your funds  to your bank account.

Be informed that as soon as the payment is received from you, there will be
no other fee and we shall proceed and complete your transfer to your
account without any further delay.


I hereby confirming to you that this transaction is 100% real, legal and
legitimate and in accordance with international banking laws and will be
transferred to your account immediately the required Processing/Stamp Duty
fee of $980 only and the cost of transfer fee of $2,700 is received from
you.

Once again, your contact phone number is not reachable, therefore you need
to get back to us with your correct phone number and your contact address
where the official documents will be mailed to.

The attached file is my working I.D.
Thanks,
Mr. Jerome Powell
